1284230.name: Movie World
1284230.description:
In Movie World you can build your own movie studio. Produce entertaining and glamorous movies. Research new technologies to keep up with the industry. Expand into series, compete with other studios, receive the awards, create franchises and prevail in the movie business.


Produce entertaining and glamorous movies. Learn to write a perfect script! Hire the main star and the director! Choose a movie theme from 16 different genres!


Keep a close eye on the market in the movie industry! It has a big impact on movie distribution in the later game. Produce good movies and series that will expand your market share!


Research new technology to keep up with the industry otherwise you will be left behind which will result in bad movie quality and box office.


Movie News is your biggest tool! Learn interesting facts about the movie industry.
Gain insight on movie development and ruin rival studio reputation by writing a bad press!

Features
  • Build your own movie studio
  • Produce movies
  • Produce series
  • Receive awards
  • Compete with other studios
  • Research new technology
  • Create franchises
  • Analyze the market
  • Upgrade and expand
  • Industry news
1284230.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
